title: Joey Mullins’s New Book “Hezekiah’s Maple: One Man’s Journey with Cancer and Hope” is a Telling Autobiography about a Devout Christian’s Battle with Cancer
text:
Joey Mullins, a husband, father, grandfather, Community Support Specialist with Georgia Family Connection Partnership, scholar in Christian Ministries and Master of Divinity in Theology, cancer patient, devoted writer, and author, has completed his new book “Hezekiah’s Maple: One Man’s Journey with Cancer and Hope”; a gripping and potent work about how the author’s faith and belief gave him the strength during dark times. This book is for those who are facing the darkest moments of their life as they confront life-threatening illnesses and the unknown turns that lie before them. As one reads Joey’s journey, they will hear answers, be encouraged, gain a sense of hope, and be inspired. This book is for those who don’t know what to say to their friends or loved ones during such a time. Joey will say it for you as he shares the experience of his journey. As one reads, they will identify with the struggles he dealt with and almost every emotion will be touched. They will find comfort and peace as they read of his battle with life and death. Joey has the incredible ability to share his deepest feelings and encourage others in expressing his trust and faith in God.
"This author has walked through the valley of the shadow of death and has been comforted by the warmth of the knowledge of the Son’s presence,” said Tim Tudor, Hospice Spiritual Care Coordinator.
Published by New York City-based Page Publishing, Joey Mullins’s poignant tale gives the reader of sense of hope and encouragement. “Hezekiah’s Maple: One Man’s Journey with Cancer and Hope” is the very personal diary of one man’s battle with cancer, and the hope which has sustained him through this journey. It is written from the viewpoint and heart of a Christian, and faith and hope are centerpieces of the work. The author was diagnosed with cancer in January of 2014.
“Hezekiah’s Maple” is a record of blogs written throughout the year, revealing his hope even in the darkest of times, uncovering moments of despair and darkness, and how he came through them to the other side. Readers of the blogs have described them as “inspirational and encouraging, and beneficial to any who might read them, whether suffering from cancer or involved in another health crisis, or difficult situations unrelated to health altogether.” This is a book to not only read for yourself, but also to share with a friend in need of inspiration and direction.
Readers who wish to experience this profound work can purchase “Hezekiah’s Maple: One Man’s Journey with Cancer and Hope” at bookstores everywhere, or online at the Apple iTunes store, Amazon, Google Play or Barnes and Noble.
